title: Proposal: Integrate Wolfram Alpha for Enhanced Trading and Risk Management

reasoning.problem: Allocate resources to integrate Wolfram Alpha's computational capabilities into existing trading strategies and risk management models. Specifically, focus on its potential to enhance alpha generation, improve risk modeling, and automate API generation. Conduct a pilot program to quantify the benefits before full-scale implementation.
